project_abstract.cdata: The Sixth Highway Project will comprise: (a) construction of six road sections in Bosnia-Herzegovina, totalling about 151 km; (b) staff training for transportation economists and highway engineers engaged in highway feasibility studies; and (c) purchase of engineering and laboratory equipment for the Republic and Provincial road organizations.
